effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 661,218.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 3,329 for 20 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
